name: berry-juice
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 20 HP.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A 100 percent pure juice made of Berries. When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A 100 percent pure juice made of Berries. When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A 100 percent pure juice made of Berries. When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.
